title: AfropolitanNYC(2015 Finale) @ Empire Hotel Rooftop
desc: (Note: Rooftop will be open or closed depending on weather) 2015 Finale of NYC's Largest & Most Diverse Afro-Caribbean Mixer For Diaspora Professionals ? Come Early To Network | Stay Late To Party Free Before 7:00pm with RSVP | $10.00 after 7:00pm You must RSVP by EOD on Thursday December 3rd to be added to the guestlist **Note: You must be checked in by 7:00pm for free admission. There is usually a line so plan to arrive, latest by 6:30pm to ensure you are checked in by 7:00pm. Checkout the video and photos below for a taste of the Afropolitan Afropolitan Video:  https://vimeo.com/134194864 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ?  Join us for an evening of connections and culture over cocktails @ NYC's largest Afro-Caribbean mixer where diaspora professionals can connect, unwind and enjoy incredible fusion of Afro-Caribbean music by A-list superstar DJs. Space is limited and we are anticipating a full house so please RSVP as soon as possible. Join me and over 500 hundred other professionals, and get ready for a unique and exciting Afropolitan experience. DJs: DJ EL-G | DJ Spynfo | DJ Birane? Music: Afrobeats | Dancehall Reggae | Soca | Hiphop | Pop | Latin *************************************************************************************************************** ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ?
